Posts.Content: Feb 15, 2010 12:02PM leta17 wrote: mslrg - HERE HERE!! I have had minimal SE's from 2 of 6 rounds of TC and still don't feel 'lucky' because these tx plans are so archaic, there really hasn't been that much progress in tx,  it is still 'chemo', even if our tx plans are not as long as those 10 years before, and yes they have come up with drugs to help the SE's, but what about a better solution to prevent IT in the first place?  Is money being spent on that?!    ARGHH, I am angry today!
Posts.Title: After 1st T/C chemo: What nobody tells you JudyM mslrg
